DESCRIPTION: Matiku health facility is located in Makueni town, in Makueni county in Kenya.The health facility is founded on a Partnership for Primary Care (P4PC) model.This model involves outsourcing the operation of primary health facilities to the Philips/Amref partnership. A feasibility pilot has been ongoing since 2019, the pilot has involved upgrading of Emali health center, Matiku and Tutini dispensaries and documentation of lessons learnt. The pilot will inform the scaling of the project to other facilities in Makueni County.The objective of the project was to address access to primary health care through improvements in quality of care, engagement of communities, financial sustainability, and system efficiency.The partners involved in this project include :-  Philips, Amref and Makueni County governement.The project was started in, March 2019 as a  Feasibility Pilot(Commercial).
